heading: Diablo 4 PTR Patch 1.5.0 Notes!
content: and game system updates have been posted shortly after the Season 5 Campfire Chat. There are an absolute ton of changes, updates, and adjustments to go over! See below for all the information. Worldly Finesse - Offensive Unbroken Chain - Amulet Aspect of Forward Momentum - Mobility Slayer's Finesse - Offensive Björnfang's Tusks - Unique Gloves Aspect of the Rushing Wilds - Mobility Ultimate
